name: Check if Admin able to update a program with invalid program Description

steps.name: Given  Admin creates PUT Request with Program Name for the LMS API endpoint with valid request Body with mandatory , additional  fields.
When  Admin sends Put Request and Pgm Descrip starting with Number in request Body with endpoint
Then  Admin receives 400 Bad Request Status for put Pgm descrip starting with number
